p: For J. flava Agyare et al. [ 14] demonstrated that methanol leaf extract was active against Escherichia coli ATCC 25922, Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 4853 and Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923. However there seem to be limited studies showing its efficacy against clinical strains, especially those of MDR isolates from post-operative wound infection. Generally, there seems to be just few studies on the medicinal properties of J. flava although commonly available in Ghana [ 14].
